review_title: The light from Moravian Hall's five stars shine bright from the moment you enter the parking lot!
pros: Staff in all departments are friendly and go out of their way to help both residents and co-workers. A well structured, multi-level, chain of command makes addressing workplace issues easy and immediate. All staff play an active role in care-planning, making staff feel valuable and resulting in better quality of care for the resident. The wages are definitely competitive for the area and the incentives are nice as well. There is a considerably low staff turn-over rate which speaks volumes about any healthcare facility today.
cons: Too many part-time and per diem employees in healthcare make it very difficult to get hours.  Many of the benefits and incentives that make Moravian Hall stand above other facilities are being taken away by administration without warning and actually end up punishing good employees.

pros: Clean and neat workers great
cons: Benefits are a little high

pros: Good experience with customer service and dining
cons: The management and poor salary

pros:
Flexible Hours

Love the Residents

Good Communication with Boss
cons:

Limited hours

job_title: Personal Care Assistant in Bethlehem, PA
pros: Residents, admin and house keeping staff and hr staff are supportive
cons: Short staff, no help from nurses and most direct co workers

job_title: Supervisor Licensed Practical Nurse in Nazareth, PA
pros: Clean facility plenty of supplies great staff and residents
cons: Short staffed not in budget to hire more employees benefits are horrible no raises work as if ur are 5 people for a whooping pay of 23 an hr

pros: Every one that works there is great. The residents are wonderful. It really is a beautiful place for seniors to live.
cons: Management stinks. They have their pet's and if your not one of them you don't count at all. They work you to death because they're to cheap to allow part timers to have any extra hours to help out the full timers. Greed is their middle name. I wouldn't recommend this place to anyone. Don't just walk away from this place, RUN.

job_title: Licensed Practical Nurse in Nazareth, PA
pros: Residents receive decent care. The facility has an inviting feel to it at first glance. There is more equipment to utilize more than most places.
cons: Management has their own agenda. There is favoritism at a devastating level. The health benefits are extremely expensive.  Staff are awful to each other.

job_title: Certified Nurse's Assistant Mentor in Nazareth, PA
pros: Work wonderful with new employees
cons: The pay to low for long term employees

pros: Work environment, co-workers, the work is very rewarding.
cons: Pay isn't the greatest to start out.

job_title: Night Shift Charge Nurse in Nazareth, PA
pros: Pros are the residents and the company does pay well.
cons: Cons are nurses are a dime a dozen per management and the CNAS run the place.
